@@ -377,6 +377,7 @@ class NewCriterionTest(InputVariableMixin, CriterionTest):
     def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
         super(NewCriterionTest, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
         self.check_gradgrad = kwargs.get('check_gradgrad', True)

body: Like test only specific tests? You can do `pytest test/test_nn.py -k "kl_div" -v` (if you have pytest installed) to test all tests in test_nn.py that have the string "kl_div" in them.
body_html: Like test only specific tests? You can do pytest test/test_nn.py -k "kl_div" -v (if you have pytest installed) to test all tests in test_nn.py that have the string "kl_div" in them.
body_text: Like test only specific tests? You can do pytest test/test_nn.py -k "kl_div" -v (if you have pytest installed) to test all tests in test_nn.py that have the string "kl_div" in them.
